page.title: 18Local Survey (2)
page.content: In our survey we asked about the use of local facilites, libraries, shops and shopping areas, churches, sports areas. We found them to be heavily used. Despite easy transport local shops hold their own against competition from town supermarkets. LIBRARY - Over 50% use it. SPORTS - Local facilities used by almost all families especially the swimming pool. CHURCHES - Regular attendance and interest. WORK - 15% locally, 50% Preston, others commute as far as Manchester and Lancaster. TRANSPORT - Cars used for work and leisure. Occasional use of bus service - mainly work. MEANING, FULWOOD 'FUL WUDU' (Old English) - a foul or filthy wood - disagreed with!
